metadata.synopsis: Child who's been trained to fight - swelling with pride and confident they can handle whatever's coming.
metadata.how_to_trigger: from crashsite:oe readyattackondenin reCon: teleport S_DEN_Trainee_002

0.speaker: Ide
0.text: I can't wait to go. This place is boring.

1.speaker: Ide
1.text: You can hide in here if you like. No one's getting past us.
1.context: NodeContext: Casual, confident, trying to impress player

2.speaker: Ide
2.text: Asharak says goblins are just little like us. Easy.
2.context: NodeContext: Casual, confident, trying to impress player

4.speaker: Ide
4.text: Hope we meet some monsters on the road. I want to practice.

5.speaker: Ide
5.text: I told you I wasn't afraid. Those goblins look tiny.
5.context: NodeContext: Insistent, almost disbelieving - now that s/he sees goblins up close s/he's definitely not afraid

6.speaker: Ide
6.text: I'm glad you killed all the goblins. I hope you made them scared.
6.context: NodeContext: Insistent, almost disbelieving - now that s/he sees goblins up close s/he's definitely not afraid
